docs.snippet: Authorities in Ohio say a 14-year-old alleged ringleader and two other teenagers have been arrested in connection with dozens of aggravated robberies and carjackings in Cleveland, including one case in which a woman and her 7-year-old son were hel...
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities in Ohio say a 14-year-old alleged ringleader and two other teenagers have been arrested in connection with dozens of aggravated robberies and carjackings in Cleveland, including one case in which a woman and her 7-year-old son were held at gunpoint.

headline.main: 3 Teens Accused in Dozens of Ohio Robberies, Carjackings
headline.print_headline: 3 Teens Accused in Dozens of Ohio Robberies, Carjackings
